home.text: I am a full-stack developer and content creator. I build web applications, websites, and automate processes. Beyond coding, I create various types of content â€“ from professional advertising films and casual vlogs to gaming videos and promotional reels for businesses and brands. I love building something from nothing. Completing tasks that help grow a business while bringing joy is my main goal. I enjoy collaborating on innovative projects â€“ if you have an idea, letâ€™s make it happen together!

about.title: I love creating something out of nothing.
about.text: ğŸš€ My journey into programming and content creation wasn't typical â€“ I started in an automotive technical school but quickly realized that I didnâ€™t want to spend my life in a workshop fixing other peopleâ€™s cars. I'm still passionate about the automotive world, but only when it comes to my own projects, without client pressure. Instead, I discovered that I'm passionate about creating â€“ both in code and media. I love building applications, automating processes, and crafting engaging content. I initially studied computer science full-time, but I soon realized that I prefer learning practical skills that I can immediately apply â€“ so I switched to part-time studies and began intensively developing my skills as a programmer and content creator.
about.text2: ğŸ’» I couldn't decide whether to go for backend or frontend, so the choice was simple â€“ full-stack. I love designing intuitive interfaces as much as building efficient systems and scripts where just a few lines of code can save days of work. I create web applications, websites, and process automation according to client requirements, but above all, with users in mind â€“ they are the ones who use my work daily, so I always prioritize functionality, convenience, and real value.
about.text3: ğŸ¬ I stumbled into the content creation industry somewhat by accident, but it quickly became my second passion. Thanks to a company I still collaborate with today (I started working there as a warehouse worker), I learned how to properly use my creativity and the magic of editing. I also picked up new skills like writing scripts, managing social media, and marketing strategies. In this role, too, I build something from nothing â€“ I create creative videos and ads that work, as well as content that engages audiences. I also enjoy more relaxed content, such as gaming ğŸ®, vlogs ğŸ¥, or videos with a more artistic touch.
about.text4: ğŸ’¡ Growth â€“ both my own and that of the people and businesses I work with. I donâ€™t do things 'just for the sake of it' â€“ every website should provide value, every video should have an impact, and every automation should genuinely improve workflow. I listen to users' needs and look for the best solutions because creation is a process, and every detail matters.
about.text5: ğŸ² I love games â€“ both video games and board games. I plan to create my own game and board game, mainly for fun, but who knows â€“ maybe someone will get hooked, and something interesting will come out of it. ğŸ‹ï¸â€â™‚ï¸ Sports are the perfect escape from work for me. I usually go for the gym and Muay Thai â€“ it helps me reset and focus on myself. Besides, sitting all day isnâ€™t very healthy. ğŸ˜† ğŸ¸ I can play classical guitar, but Iâ€™m not great at it â€“ I know a few campfire songs, and thatâ€™s about it. ğŸ˜… ğŸ± I love animals â€“ I have a cat named Leon. ğŸ“¹ In 2025, I want to start making YouTube videos, so if I get the courage to do it, there will be a YT button here linking to my channel. ğŸ¤ If you made it to the end, you either have too much time, I really got you interested, or youâ€™re just a cool person.

web_app.title_text: I design and create websites and web applications tailored to your needs. I listen to your expectations, but I always remember that users come first. Check out how working with me looks and how the project realization process unfolds.
web_app.text3: The first step is an informal meeting where we discuss your expectations. I want to learn about your business or personal brand, the values it represents, the colors and style that best reflect it, and the purpose of the website or application. This is the moment when we outline the initial project sketch â€“ what should be on the site, how the application should function, and how it should interact with users. We also determine who will be responsible for the website content â€“ whether I should create it, whether it's already prepared, or if weâ€™ll collaborate with another person. The same applies to graphics and photos â€“ we will discuss whether you already have materials or need them to be prepared.
web_app.text4: Based on our discussion, I prepare an initial visual design of the website or application along with its functional structure. You donâ€™t have to approve it right away â€“ this is the stage where making changes is encouraged. I wonâ€™t always agree with you, as my goal is to create a functional and intuitive solution for your users, but I always take your vision into account. During the visual design presentation, I will also provide a cost estimate for the entire project. The price will not change from this point unless critical situations arise, such as a massive change in the final project phase.
web_app.text5: After the visual design is approved, I move on to working on the website or application. At this stage, we have slightly less contact, but I am always available if new ideas arise or changes need to be made. If the project is more complex, we can schedule another meeting to discuss progress.
web_app.text6: This is the moment when I show you the results of our work â€“ your website or application! If something doesnâ€™t meet your expectations, minor adjustments can be made immediately. I want you to be fully satisfied with the project, so I appreciate your honest feedback.
web_app.text7: My collaboration with you doesnâ€™t end when I hand over the project! If you need help choosing hosting, SEO optimization, or have any questions about how the site works, you can always count on me. And if you ever need a new website or application â€“ just let me know, weâ€™ll surely work something out! ğŸ˜Š

video.text: Do you want your brand to stand out on social media? I create engaging videos that capture attention and build strong relationships with your audience.
video.text1: Short, dynamic, and to the point â€“ an ad should grab attention in the first few seconds. I create films that effectively showcase your brand, product, or service. You tell me what you want to communicate to your customers, and Iâ€™ll make sure your message reaches the widest possible audience.
video.text1_montage: âœ… I donâ€™t just edit random shots â€“ I create a well-thought-out story. I focus on what you want to convey. Every film is not just an image, but a message that impacts the audience.
video.text1_highlights: âœ… I highlight what makes your product, service, or brand stand out. I analyze what you do, what makes you the best, and how to showcase it in a dynamic, engaging video.
video.text1_one: âœ… One film â€“ many possibilities. I create materials that work on websites as well as social media. I adapt them so that one video can be effectively promoted in different formats â€“ from wide-screen to vertical reels.
video.text1_plan: âœ… Before I press 'record' â€“ we plan. Before starting work, I fully understand your product, brand, and the message you want to convey. Iâ€™ll help you create something that not only looks good but also stands out and stays memorable.
video.text1_ideal: Perfect for those who want to increase their online visibility and stand out from the competition.
video.text_2: Authenticity is key to building an engaged community. Iâ€™ll help you create vlogs that not only document but tell stories in an interesting and engaging way.
video.text_2_strategy: âœ… Strategy tailored to vlogging â€“ I canâ€™t spend the whole day with you, so you record, and I handle the rest. You send me raw footage, and with the magic of editing, I create films that match your style and vibe.
video.text_2_story: âœ… I structure the story of each episode â€“ Every vlog is not just recorded moments but a well-thought-out narrative. I create cohesive and engaging stories that draw in viewers.
video.text_2_speed: âœ… Regularity and speed are crucial â€“ In the world of vlogs, consistent publishing is key. If you send me last-minute materials, Iâ€™ll do my best to deliver a finished video as quickly as possible â€“ without sacrificing quality. In extreme cases, Iâ€™ll let you know if itâ€™s better to delay by a day rather than rush something out.
video.text_2_collaboration: âœ… Full optimization of collaboration â€“ If you want to streamline the process, I can handle uploading videos to your channel. First, Iâ€™ll upload them as unlisted for your approval, then publish them for your audience. Iâ€™ve been managing such channels in three languages for two years, so I know how it works.
video.text_2_ideal: Perfect for online creators, personal brands, and businesses that want to show behind-the-scenes content.
video.text_3: Are you creating gaming content and want to attract a larger audience? Iâ€™ll edit your footage so that viewers keep coming back for more.
video.text_3_dynamic: âœ… Dynamic highlight editing â€“ Fast cuts, the best moments, and smooth narration that keeps viewers engaged from start to finish.
video.text_3_effect: âœ… Effects, animations, and sound design â€“ I add sounds, meme effects, and creative transitions that enhance emotions and humor in your content.
video.text_3_adaption: âœ… Adapting to the game and community â€“ Every game has its own vibe, and every community has its inside jokes. I tailor the editing to your style and what entertains your audience.
video.text_3_platforms: âœ… Content for every platform â€“ Full gameplay videos, highlights, or short clips to attract new viewers? I adapt formats for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and other platforms to maximize your reach.
video.text_3_ideal: Your strategy, your vibe â€“ Pop culture references, sharp humor, dynamic pacing? I edit content in a way that perfectly matches you and your community. We can create full let's plays, extract the best moments from streams, or turn clips into viral short videos.
video.text_4: Short-form content dominates the internet! If you want to gain viral reach on Instagram and TikTok, I create videos that grab attention and engage users.
video.text_4_dynamic: âœ… Dynamic editing in line with trends â€“ I create content that captures attention in the first second but isnâ€™t just a fleeting viral hit â€“ I focus on quality that stands the test of time.
video.text_4_creative: âœ… Creative transitions and effects â€“ I add unique visual and sound effects that not only fit trends but also highlight your style and make you stand out.
video.text_4_sound: âœ… Music and sound design at the highest level â€“ I use carefully selected music, sound effects, and editing rhythm to make your video even more impactful and immersive.
video.text_4_cringe: âœ… Optimization for algorithms and long-term content â€“ Trends change quickly, but good videos last. I ensure that your content is not only highly clickable but also aesthetically pleasing, polished, and free of cringe even months later.
video.text_4_ideal: I donâ€™t create empty viral content. Even short formats like reels and shorts can be valuable. I focus on ensuring that every piece of content has quality that will promote you not just now but also in the future.
video.text_5_create: ğŸ”¹ I create from A to Z â€“ from scriptwriting to filming to final editing.
video.text_5_style: ğŸ”¹ I adapt the style to your industry and target audience.
video.text_5_support: ğŸ”¹ I help develop a content strategy for your profile.
video.text_5_ideal: Do you want to stand out online? Whether you're building a personal brand, growing a business, or just creating content for fun â€“ Iâ€™ll help you produce videos that capture attention! ğŸ¥âœ¨ Contact me, and letâ€™s create something amazing together. ğŸš€
